colors: accented by the rich red of the Ruby and the creamy white of the Pearls.

description: This Diamond Haaram is a statement piece, representing the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the luster of the gold, making it a valuable heirloom to cherish for generations. Each diamond is meticulously set to maximize its brilliance.
